title: Counter Strike 1.6 v42 WCG Configured
description:
COUNTER-STRIKE 1.6 v42 [WCG Configured]
Final (15.6.2011)

This release is a full standalone, WCG Configured, non-steam version of Counter-Strike 1.6. Play the world's number 1 online action game. Engage in an incredibly realistic brand of terrorist warfare in this wildly popular team-based game. Ally with teammates to complete strategic missions. Take out enemy sites. Rescue hostages. Your role affects your team's success. Your team's success affects your role.

Features:

- Includes WCG GUI
- WCG Server settings (dedicated server.cfg)
- Clean rip from Steam
- No modifications, except where noted.
- Protocol 48
- Playable on LAN and Nonsteam Servers
- Half-Life is Included
- Steam Account is not required.
- RevEmu 9.85
- Working Favorites
- Dedicated Server 

Modifications:

- CZ Bots added
- Ingame ads Removed
- Original models instead of CZ ones.
- Uses Setti masterserver for a list of nonsteam servers
